sen.j: 中村七之助（なかむら しちのすけ）は歌舞伎の名跡の一。
sen.e: Shichinosuke NAKAMURA is one of the Myoseki (professional name passed down from generation to generation) of Kabuki.
Shichinosuke NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Shichinosuke NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.

sen.j: 中村座座元所縁の名で、三代目中村七三郎の前名に由来する。
sen.e: It is connected with Zamoto (leader of a theatrical company) of Nakamura-za theatre and derives from the previous name of Shichisaburo NAKAMURA the third.
It is connected with Zamoto (leader of a theatrical company) of Nakamura-za Theater and derives from the previous name of the third Shichisaburo NAKAMURA.
sen.cmt: 用語表現を合わせました。
sen.e: It is connected with Zamoto (leader of a theatrical company) of Nakamura-za Theater and derives from the previous name of the third Shichisaburo NAKAMURA.
The stage family name is Nakamuraya.
The stage family name is Nakamuraya.
The stage family name is Nakamuraya.
Jomon (family crest) is ginkgo leaves in an octagon.
The Jomon (family crest) is Sumikiri Icho (ginkgo leaves in an octagon).
sen.cmt: 用語表現を合わせました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Sumikiri Icho (ginkgo leaves in an octagon).
Shichinosuke NAKAMURA the first
The First
The First

sen.j: - 中村七三郎 (3代目)・中村勘三郎 (9代目)に同じ。
sen.e: Same person as Shichisaburo NAKAMURA the third and Kanzaburo NAKAMURA the ninth.
Same person as Shichisaburo NAKAMURA (the third) and Kanzaburo NAKAMURA (the ninth).
Same person as Shichisaburo NAKAMURA (the third) and Kanzaburo NAKAMURA (the ninth).
Shichinosuke NAKANURA the second
The Second
The Second

sen.j: - 中村勘三郎 (18代目)の次男。
sen.e: The second son of Kanzaburo NAKAMURA the 18th.
The second son of Kanzaburo NAKAMURA (the 18th).
The second son of Kanzaburo NAKAMURA (the 18th).

sen.j: 中村七之助 (2代目)を参照。
sen.e: Refer to Shichinosuke NAKAMURA the second.
Refer to Shichinosuke NAKAMURA (the second).
